thread.title: Janhvi Kapoor reveals she became more religious, superstitious after Sridevi’s death; admits she still hasn’t accepted her mother’s absence: ‘I think she’s travelling’ | Bollywood News - The Indian Express

author: Entertainment Desk
title: Janhvi Kapoor reveals she became more religious, superstitious after Sridevi’s death; admits she still hasn’t accepted her mother’s absence: ‘I think she’s travelling’ | Bollywood News - The Indian Express
text: Janhvi Kapoor reveals she became more religious, superstitious after Sridevi’s death Entertainment Updated: May 26, 2024 19:29 IST While gearing up for the release of her film Mr & Mrs Mahi, actor Janhvi Kapoor shared how the sudden loss of her mother Sridevi transformed her outlook and made her more religious. Recalling that Sridevi was a very superstitious person, Janhvi said that she became more religious and superstitious after her demise. She also admitted that she has not fully come to terms with Sridevi’s death.
